headline: Did Softer 2026 Guidance Amid Cost Inflation Just Shift O'Reilly Automotive's (ORLY) Investment Narrative?
summary: In late February 2026, O'Reilly Automotive reported quarterly revenue growth of 7.8% with solid comparable store sales and earnings growth, but issued full-year guidance that came in below analyst expectations amid inflation-driven SG&A cost pressures. Despite strong professional demand and a high 19.5% operating margin, investors are weighing the impact of a softening do-it-yourself segment and rising cost inflation against plans for faster store expansion in 2026. We’ll now examine how...
